Veterinarian Name(s): Dr. Jane Smith, Dr. Bob Johnson
Practice Description: Holistic Paws Veterinary Clinic offers integrative veterinary care combining the best of Eastern and Western medicine. Our experienced team specializes in acupuncture, herbal medicine, and nutritional therapy to help your pets achieve optimal health naturally.

Natural Balance Animal Wellness provides comprehensive holistic veterinary services including acupuncture, chiropractic care, and Traditional Chinese Veterinary Medicine. Dr. Chen has over 15 years of experience helping animals heal naturally.

Integrative Pet Care Center combines conventional veterinary medicine with holistic approaches including herbal medicine, homeopathy, and laser therapy. We believe in treating the whole animal, not just the symptoms.
